biotools.summary: This package provides a client for the BioConductor corresponding web resource, which is a central location where curated data from experiments, publications or training courses can be accessed. Each resource has associated metadata, tags and date of modification. The client creates and manages a local cache of files retrieved enabling quick and reproducible access.

bioschemas.name: ExperimentHub
